channel.title: Template on j3rrry
channel.description: Recent content in Template on j3rrry

item.title: Hugo Templating
item.description:
.

Whitespace1

-는 whitespace를 제거해준다.

without -

      <header class="list-header">
        {{ with .Site.Params.headerSubtext }}
        <p class="list-header-subtext">{{ . }}</p>
        {{ end }}
        <h1 class="list-header-title">{{ .Title }}</h1>

with -

      <header class="list-header">
        {{- with .Site.Params.headerSubtext }}
        <p class="list-header-subtext">{{ . }}</p>
        {{ end -}}
        <h1 class="list-header-title">{{ .Title }}</h1>

RESULT without:

      <header class="list-header">

        <p class="list-header-subtext">K-Shield Jr. CM 2기</p>

        <h1 class="list-header-title">posts</h1>

RESULT with:

      <header class="list-header">
        <p class="list-header-subtext">K-Shield Jr. CM 2기</p>
        <h1 class="list-header-title">posts</h1>
  1. https://gohugo.io/templates/introduction/#whitespace ^
